name: Bad Santa (itch) (lazukoanimates)
description:
Made for a game jam, this is a quick Christmas themed horror game called Bad Santa. It is made in Unreal Engine 5.0.3 and uses the Free asset Horror Engine as well as a few assets I bought.

To play, you need to enter the lift and find your way back to the start room.

Sometimes it is dark. There is a light switch and also some things you can use to light up the environment.

Controls:

W: Forward (with shift to sprint)
S: Backwards
A: Go left
D: Go right
X: Opens lift (elevator)
F: Turns on the flashlight
T: Lights the torch
N: Powers the night vision

There is a gun on the lower level, it fires but doesn't do anything yet - sorry

If I had more time I would have added some particle atmospherics.

Enjoy and please feedback.
